document_data.name: Gha'an
document_data.mainbody: '''Gha'an''' was a [[githyanki]] child from [[Crèche Y'llek]] on [[Toril]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: Gha'an had a shaved head and was dressed in leather pants and [[pauldrons]] of githyanki design.
document_data.History: Githyanki of what would become Crèche Y'llek, attacked and claimed the [[Rosymorn Monastery]] of [[Lathander]] in the [[Western Heartlands]] sometime in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]]. Gha'an was hatched in the Crèche and, along with other gith children, attended military and combat training around the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, during [[the Absolute]] crisis.
